1.title: Book round-trip flights to Paris
1.description: Search for the best flight deals to CDG or ORY airports.

2.title: Book accommodation in Paris
2.description: Find a hotel or apartment, preferably in central arrondissements like the 1st, 4th, or 6th.

3.title: Purchase travel insurance
3.description: Ensure coverage for health, cancellations, and lost luggage.

4.title: Verify passport and documents
4.description: Check that your passport is valid for at least 6 months beyond travel dates.

5.title: Purchase Paris Museum Pass
5.description: Buy a 4-day or 6-day pass to save on entry fees for the Louvre, Versailles, etc.

6.title: Set up local transportation pass
6.description: Buy a Navigo Decouverte or a pack of tickets for the Metro/RER.

7.title: Day 1: Iconic Landmarks & River Cruise
7.description: Check-in, visit Eiffel Tower (book tickets in advance!), and take a sunset Seine River Cruise.

8.title: Day 2: Art & History (Louvre)
8.description: Spend the morning at the Louvre, followed by a stroll through Tuileries Garden.

9.title: Day 3: Montmartre Charm
9.description: Visit Sacré-Cœur, explore the artist square (Place du Tertre), and see the Moulin Rouge.

10.title: Day 4: Left Bank & Latin Quarter
10.description: See Notre-Dame (exterior), visit Shakespeare and Company, and relax in Luxembourg Gardens.

11.title: Day 5: Royal Day Trip to Versailles
11.description: Full day excursion to the Palace and Gardens of Versailles (take the RER C train).

12.title: Day 6: Fashion & Le Marais Shopping
12.description: Walk the Champs-Élysées to the Arc de Triomphe, then explore the boutiques of Le Marais.

13.title: Day 7: Hidden Gems & Departure
13.description: Visit Père Lachaise Cemetery, enjoy Canal Saint-Martin, and buy last-minute souvenirs.

14.title: Pack luggage
14.description: Include comfortable walking shoes and layers for Parisian weather.

15.title: Organize vacation photos
15.description: Sort and edit trip photos; share with family/friends.

16.title: Post-trip expense tracking
16.description: Categorize spending and settle any shared costs.
